unnormalised: Exam Prep Apps: Your Secret Weapon This Exam Season?
normalised: Exam Prep Apps: Your Secret Weapon This Exam Season?

unnormalised: Are you drowning in NCERT books, chai stains, and last-minute notes? Fear not, future engineers and doctors! Exam prep apps are booming in India, offering a lifeline to students gearing up for those pressure-cooker entrance exams.
normalised: Are you drowning in N C E R T books, chai stains, and last-minute notes? Fear not, future engineers and doctors! Exam prep apps are booming in India, offering a lifeline to students gearing up for those pressure-cooker entrance exams.

unnormalised: Think Vedantu, BYJU'S, and Testbook – these aren't just apps; they're practically tuition classes in your pocket. From JEE Main to NEET, and even UPSC, there's an app for everything.
normalised: Think Vedantu, B Y J U 'S, and Testbook – these aren't just apps; they're practically tuition classes in your pocket. From J E E Main to N E E T, and even U P S C, there's an app for everything.

unnormalised: What’s the buzz? Personalized learning paths, mock tests that mimic the real deal, and doubt-clearing sessions at 2 AM (because, let's be real, that's when inspiration strikes!).
normalised: What’s the buzz? Personalized learning paths, mock tests that mimic the real deal, and doubt-clearing sessions at two A M (because, let's be real, that's when inspiration strikes!).

unnormalised: Forget cramming! These apps use gamification and interactive videos to make learning, dare we say, *fun*? Plus, many offer regional language support, catering to students from Chennai to Chandigarh.
normalised: Forget cramming! These apps use gamification and interactive videos to make learning, dare we say, *fun*? Plus, many offer regional language support, catering to students from Chennai to Chandigarh.

unnormalised: Just like grandma’s Onam Sadhya provides everything you need, these apps aim to be your complete exam prep package.
normalised: Just like grandma’s Onam Sadhya provides everything you need, these apps aim to be your complete exam prep package.

unnormalised: So, ditch the stress, download an app, and maybe grab a plate of biryani – you deserve it! Good luck, and may the odds (and your internet connection) be ever in your favor!
normalised: So, ditch the stress, download an app, and maybe grab a plate of biryani – you deserve it! Good luck, and may the odds (and your internet connection) be ever in your favor!
